research_interests:
Dr. Linscott is a translational researcher focused on urothelial carcinoma, with a particular interest in the discovery and development of urinary cell-free DNA biomarkers. Dr. Linscott’s research goals include defining patterns of urinary cell-free DNA methylation as predictors of treatment response and disease progression, as well as studying the tumor immune microenvironment in BCG-treated patients using spatial transcriptomics.
  *
